title: Hour 1: Mitchell on the Move
description:
In Canton, Stephen A, Marcus Spears, Doug Williams, as well as Central State football head coach Kevin Porter and LB Kailen Abrams discuss the Black College Football Hall of Fame Classic, adding diversity to NFL coaches and executives and the Knicks need for a superstar.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Did the Knicks make the right move passing on Donovan Mitchell?
